text:
Neda Arnerić (; 15 July 1953 – 10 January 2020) was a Serbian actress and politician. She was born in Knjaževac. She was known as a sex symbol of Yugoslav cinema. She appeared in movies such as "Venom" (1971), "Shaft in Africa" (1973) and "The End of the War" (1984). From 2000 to 2004, she was a member of the National Assembly.
Arnerić was married to Milorad Mešterović from 1981 until his death in 2020. On 10 January 2020, Arnerić was found dead in Belgrade. She was 66.
